berserker_quest.name: Rage of the Warrior
berserker_quest.description: Demonstrate your ferocity by completing the Orc Encampment dungeon.

guardian_quest.name: Shield of the Protector
guardian_quest.description: Prove your defensive prowess by completing the Ogre Stronghold dungeon.

necromancer_quest.name: Gathering of Souls
necromancer_quest.description: Collect 50 Soul Essences to demonstrate your connection to the realm of death.

ranger_quest.name: Hunter's Mark
ranger_quest.description: Prove your tracking skills by slaying 50 wolves in combat.

swashbuckler_quest.name: Duel of the Daring
swashbuckler_quest.description: Show your swashbuckling prowess by completing the Bandit Camp dungeon.

wizard_quest.name: Path of the Arcane
wizard_quest.description: Prove your mastery of arcane magic by completing the Eternal Library dungeon.
